abstract: The British bank HSBC has set aside an additional $800 million connected to a money laundering investigation in the United States and says it may face criminal charges in the United States.
snippet: The British bank HSBC has set aside an additional $800 million connected to a money laundering investigation in the United States and says it may face criminal charges in the United States.

headline.main: HSBC May Face Charges in a Laundering Inquiry
headline.print_headline: HSBC May Face Charges In a Laundering Inquiry

byline.original: By Mark Scott and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
